ygData.subject: Re: When should I start smithing?
ygData.msgSnippet: i started with 30pp and 20 skill trained already around lvl 12. It took me 70-80pp to get to where i could make banded.  However, if your goal is to sharpen
ygData.messageBody:
i started with 30pp and 20 skill trained already around lvl 12.

It took me 70-80pp to get to where i could make banded. However, if your
goal is to sharpen and make studs it is feasable with 10pp.

At 12:04 PM 5/3/99 GMT, you wrote:
>From: "Andrew Unangst" <andrew_u@...>
>
>I'm a level 3 warrior/smith dwarf. I was wondering what time (level) I
>should putting points into blacksmithing? And how many points per level.
>Also, is it wise to be a tailor as well? I have many tailor friends were I
>can get leather armor, but I was wondering if it is worth the extra time to
>make your own. I also have about 1pp in the bank, to buy materials with, I
>don't worry much about buying armor, (I get cloth for real cheap)
>
